name: SearXNG
description: Privacy-focused metasearch engine aggregating results. SearXNG is a self-hosted application focused on tools, security, self-hosted, homelab. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose. It supports a wide range of use cases for homelabs and self-hosted infrastructure.
usecases: Self-host SearXNG on your home server to privacy-focused metasearch engine aggregating results without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use SearXNG to manage your tools workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
